description: There’s actually a wide array of characters you can use to make text faces with moustaches. Here’s a lot more. There are simply so many that I couldn’t make a category for every single one.. See the introduction to this category to get an idea of just how many moustache possibilities there are!   (ಠ .̫.̫ ಠ) (•̴̑⁎̵̭•̴̆) ✌(꒡͡ ો ̼̮ ꒡͡✌) (　˙灬˙　) ❛ॕ̀ੇ≀ ̼❛ॕ̀ੇ˵ (⁰︻⁰) (-◞८࿆◟࿆-) (>̯-̮<̯) ٩(-̃_̮̮̃-̃)۶ (˗̆ˍ̂˗) (•˳̂•̆) ◟( ͡° ʃヮɭ ͡°)ﾉ ᕙ། ¯ ~͜ʖ~ ¯ །ᕗ ヽ(∴｀┗Д┛´)ﾉ (⋆ʾ ˙̫̮ ʿ⋆) σ(●ﾟ┏∀┛｡●)ﾉ m(￣<ス>￣)m m(￣<マ>￣)m m(￣<ン>￣)m
title: Other Moustaches
